customer_journey.advocacy: Recommends to other farmers at co-op meetings, livestock auctions, and online forums when vet demonstrates expertise, saves valuable breeding stock worth $5,000-50,000, or helps increase herd productivity by 12-15%

Quick heads up - we're down to [NUMBER] remaining spots for our [PROGRAM NAME], and enrollment closes [DATE].

Here's why this matters for your operation:

LAST YEAR'S REALITY:
→ Average emergency call cost: $[AMOUNT]
→ Average # of emergencies per farm: [NUMBER]
→ Total annual reactive care: $[TOTAL]

THIS YEAR'S ALTERNATIVE:
→ [PROGRAM NAME] investment: $[AMOUNT/month]
→ Includes: [List key services]
→ Average client savings: $[AMOUNT]

WHAT YOU GET:
✓ [Scheduled service #1]
✓ [Scheduled service #2]
✓ [Priority access benefit]
✓ [Monitoring/reporting benefit]
✓ [Additional value item]

WHAT CLIENTS SAY:
"[TESTIMONIAL with specific result]" - [Name, Farm Type]

"[TESTIMONIAL with financial outcome]" - [Name, Location]

WHO THIS IS FOR:
• [Livestock type] operations in [SERVICE AREA]
• [Herd size range] head
• Farmers tired of crisis management
• Operations wanting predictable costs

WHO THIS ISN'T FOR:
• Operations outside [SERVICE AREA]
• Farms under [MINIMUM SIZE]
• Anyone looking for cheapest option (this is about value, not price)

NEXT STEPS:

1. SCHEDULE ASSESSMENT: [BOOKING LINK]
   (No obligation - see if it fits your operation)

2. CALL/TEXT: [PHONE]
   (Fastest way - I'll answer your questions directly)

3. REPLY TO THIS EMAIL
   (I read every response within 24 hours)

Enrollment closes [DATE] or when [NUMBER] spots fill - whichever comes first.

Let's make [YEAR] the year you spend less on emergencies and more on prevention.

Dr. [NAME]
[PRACTICE NAME]

P.S. - Not ready yet? No problem. Reply with 'MAYBE LATER' and I'll follow up in [TIMEFRAME] when we open enrollment again.

tiktok.hook: POV: Your cow's been down for 2 hours and you're 45 minutes from town
tiktok.body: Show vet truck pulling up to remote farm at dusk. Quick cuts: Examining cow, administering treatment, cow standing up. Overlay text: 'Same-day emergency response' / 'Fully equipped mobile unit' / 'No trailer needed' / End with farmer and vet fist bump as cow walks away. Voiceover: 'This is why we keep everything on the truck. Your livestock can't wait.'
tiktok.cta: Save our number before you need it. Link in bio for 24/7 emergency line

reels.body: Fast-paced reveal of equipment coming out of mobile vet truck: ultrasound machine, surgical kit, medications, testing equipment. Text overlay with running tally. End screen: 'Hospital-grade care at your gate' with total equipment value shown ($75K+)
reels.cta: Transparent pricing, professional equipment. Call for quote

ugc_prompts.prompt: Film a 15-second video showing your animal before our visit and after treatment, with simple caption about what was wrong and how quickly they recovered. Show your farm in background.
Take a photo of our vet truck at your farm and share what impressed you most about the service - response time, equipment, expertise, or outcome. Tag us!

viral_triggers.angle: Side-by-side cost comparison: 'What you pay for emergency farm call' vs 'What you lose if cow/horse dies' with actual livestock values and production loss calculations for dairy cows, breeding stock, performance horses
viral_triggers.why: Farmers are business-minded and share financial insights with peers. Reframes vet costs as investment protection. Gets shared in farming groups as practical business advice

viral_triggers.angle: 'Red flags your cow needs a vet NOW' checklist video with 8-10 specific visual symptoms (not eating + not chewing cud + hunched posture = hardware disease). Each symptom shows real footage with 'WAIT' or 'CALL NOW' verdict
viral_triggers.why: Addresses core anxiety of not knowing when to call. Farmers save and share as reference guide. Positions practice as educator not salesperson. Gets referenced in farming communities repeatedly
